summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the City's Voluntary Deferred Compensation Plan to correct a typographical error, to require at least a thirty-day waiting period before payment of benefits, to allow payment of benefits to employees in active service at age 70 1/2, to allow such employees a longer duration for deferrals, and amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 4.38.204, 4.38.401 and 4.38.402 therefor; authorizing oral and computer transfer between securities selections; and amending Sections 9, 10, and 11 of Ordinance 112517 to transfer duties of the City Comptroller and City Treasurer to the Finance Director and the City Auditor.
